ScoreEvent¶

class csoundengine.offline.ScoreEvent(p1, start, dur, args, eventId=0)[source]¶

Bases: object

A ScoreEvent represent a csound event. It is used by the offline renderer to keep track of scheduled events

NB: instances of this class are NOT created by the used directly, they are generated when scheduling events

  • eventId: a unique identifier

Attributes Summary

eventId

Attributes Documentation

eventId: int = 0¶
